name: dossier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a set of papers containing information about a person, often a criminal, or on any subject: The secret service probably has a dossier on all of us.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a collection of documents that contains information relating to a person or subject: Customs & Excise has given the committee a six-page dossier on the activities of the company. prepare/compile/keep a dossier She presented a dossier of customer complaints to the bank.
